title: Drawing, August 13, 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and touces of oxidized white gouache on cream-colored paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite with numbers and at various locations:  grass / clouds              / Black / Real path; again, at top center: (Bordo) Between Popayan & Pasto;                 again, at top right:  Rio Patia Guachicona; again, at top far right:   Aug 13/ 53 /              2 Rich orange soil broken with sods / 3 Level plane through which runs / the              River Patia.

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at center right: 1917.4.99; and at lower right:                            1971.4.99 / I 79.
description: Horizontal view over foothills and a valley looking toward mountain ranges from an elevation, with a house and roofs shown in the left foreground.   High bottom margin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, August 13, 1853.
August 13, 1853. Graphite, brush and touces of oxidized white gouache on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-99.
